data.actual_result: You are able to input special characters as channel names. When you save your changes, the channel name is set as a hyphen.
data.expected_result: Like Desktop, you shouldn't be able to even input the "&".
data.short_description: You are able to input special characters in the channel name text field.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you have the manage channels permission. - Click on a channel to edit it. - Type a special character such as an ampersant in it's name.
